subcategories.name: The Brands World of Records Stores

items.longDescription:
TOKYO UT

A collaboration between UT and four Japanese artists active in Japan and overseas, centered on the keyword “TOKYO.” This collection expresses the individual sensibilities of artists Meguru Yamaguchi, Kosuke Kawamura, FACE Oka, and YOSHIROTTEN.

YOSHIROTTEN

YOSHIROTTEN is a graphic artist and art director, based in Tokyo. He works across a wide spectrum of fields, including graphics, moving images, 3D works, installations and music. In 2018, after holding solo shows in London and Berlin, he mounted a massive exhibition of his works, titled “FUTURE NATURE” in Tokyo.

©YOSHIROTTEN
items.name: Tokyo UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: New “TOKYO” tees featuring designs from four up-and-coming Japanese artists

items.longDescription:
Haruki Murakami / Murakami Radio

Haruki Murakami is a Japanese author with fans all over the world. His novels, such as “Norwegian Wood” and “1Q84”, are widely recognized. This UT collection showcases the world of his masterpiece novels and his love for music as expressed on “Murakami Radio”.

© Haruki Murakami 2021
©Maki Sasaki 2021 by Medialynx Japan
items.name: MEN Haruki Murakami UT(Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: Introducing a collaboration between author Haruki Murakami and UT. The unique T-shirt designs feature motifs from his novels and radio program.

items.longDescription:
JEFF KOONS

The modern art master is well known for his works such as 'Balloon Dog' and 'Rabbit'. Using everyday motifs, the collection incorporates several of Koons’s iconic artworks in which empowerment and transcendence are communicated through his artistry. This collaboration celebrates 'Jeff Koons: Lost in America', the artist's first exhibition in the Gulf region, opening in Qatar in November 2021.

Born in 1955, in York, Pennsylvania, Jeff Koons is a contemporary artist based in New York. Since his first solo exhibition in 1980, his works have been exhibited in major museums, galleries, and cultural institutions around the world, including Rockefeller Center, the Palace of Versailles, the Whitney Museum of American Art, and Guggenheim Museum Bilbao. He has received numerous awards and honors in recognition of his cultural achievements. Koons is also known as a philanthropist; over the last four decades he has been involved with many causes while also serving on the board of the International Centre for Missing & Exploited Children.

© Jeff Koons, Photo: Rebecca Fanuele, Courtesy Almine Rech. In collaboration with Dadu, Children's Museum of Qatar
items.name: MEN Jeff Koons UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: Sophisticated pop artworks by one of the greatest contemporary artists, Jeff Koons!

items.longDescription:
- Blended a comfortable cotton with 19.5 micron high-quality Merino wool.
- Machine washable for easy care.
- Revised the fit and updated to a trendy cut with an overall more relaxed feel.
- Hem ribbing that is moderately fitted. We made adjustments to make sure the waist does not feel too tight when worn tucked in.
- Collar ribbing made slightly wider, so it won't get in the way of your innerwear.
- Cotton dyed so the color has more depth.

items.shortDescription: Reviewed the design details, fabric, and color to make it a more premium and comfortable sweater.

items.longDescription:
- Groundbreaking DRY-EX material dries sweat and moisture incredibly quickly. We’ve added anti-microbial and anti-odor properties to keep you feeling fresh even in sweaty situations.
- We performed a data analysis of indigo dyeing and mudding, which are Japanese traditional crafts, and faithfully reproduced the color for the print.
- A gusset under the sleeve makes for easier movement in every direction.
- Silhouette that is easy to wear not only for sports but also for casual situations.

- The front pockets are slightly higher and the back pocket angles have been adjusted to accentuate your legs.
- A proprietary and unique distressing process, developed by the Jean Innovation Center's cutting-edge technology and jean-processing specialists, creates a timeworn, authentic look and feel.
- The buttons and rivet colors are made with natural, worn-in plating, so you'll love the details.

- Uses a special inner-lining to prevent static electricity.
- This season’s updates includes a wider quilt for a more casual look.
- In response to customer feedback, we changed the size to make it look neat and not too tight.
- The collar stands up firmly and looks sharp.
- Three-dimensional gusset under the armpit makes it easy to move your arms.
- In a stylish matte finish.
items.name: MEN Ultra Light Down Jacket
items.shortDescription: A thin, light, and warm down jacket. Attention has been paid to the design and comfort of each part.

items.composition: Face: 66% Polyester, 34% Cotton/ Back: 66% Polyester, 34% Cotton
items.longDescription:
- The Uniqlo U collection is the realization of a dedicated and skilled team of international designers based at our Paris Research and Development Center led by Artistic Director Christophe Lemaire.
- Water-repellent bonded triple-layer fabric made from polyester and cotton.
- The hood and front placket block out wind and rain.
- Boxy cut with a longer hem at the back for extra coverage.
- A modern blouson made with performance fabric in an on-trend cut and colors.
- Convenient pockets for storing cellphones and other gadgets.
items.name: MEN Oversized Mountain Parka
items.shortDescription: Performance fabric and meticulous detail. A practical parka for protection against wind and rain.
